metadata.title: Arsenal+ in English - DLC Ship Pack 1
metadata.author: bamalf and KBA3u, translated by mr_easy_money
metadata.description:
This mod replaces all the base ships in Arsenal+ with completely different ships. The ships in this mod each have their own theme separate from the vanilla ship themes, with completely new hull images and ship greebles.
In addition, certain ships have custom variants of the weapons and drones in the base Arsenal+ mod, as well as some ships having custom augments.
Lastly, the Lanius A and Lanius B have been replaced by ships with themes from the two new factions found in Arsenal+.
